meanings.sent1: The anteverted camera captured the entire scene in front of it.
meanings.sent2: Her anteverted posture made her appear more attentive.
meanings.sent3: The anteverted umbrella kept the rain from hitting his face.
meanings.sent4: The anteverted tree seemed to be reaching towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: The anteverted sign pointed the way to the park.

meanings.sent1: She carefully anteverted the mirror to get a better view.
meanings.sent2: The gymnast had to antevert her body to perform the flip.
meanings.sent3: He anteverted the book towards the light to read the text clearly.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements seemed to antevert time itself.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor decided to antevert the statue for a more dynamic look.
